channel.title: Comments on: Interview with Dylan Collins – Jolt Online Gaming

item.title: By: Darren
item.dc:creator: Darren
item.description:
Dylan knows what he's talking about.
I'm 16 and I'm into web startups, yet there's no real Irish-based Venture Capitalist available in this country.
I'm expecting I will going to have to go to companies like Y Combinator who invest in foreign companies, and move to America as I get funding (although personally I wouldn't mind this at all as I want to live there permanently, but for a large portion of Irish startups, this is not the case).
I really like the idea of a few hundred grants per year of $50,000 each.
Well since they haven't listened in the last decade, I would imagine there's even less chance of them doing anything amidst a recession.
Hopefully the new government will be more geared towards what will actually make money (i.e. technology) and save the country they're attempting to run.
item.content:encoded:
Dylan knows what he’s talking about.

I’m 16 and I’m into web startups, yet there’s no real Irish-based Venture Capitalist available in this country.

I’m expecting I will going to have to go to companies like Y Combinator who invest in foreign companies, and move to America as I get funding (although personally I wouldn’t mind this at all as I want to live there permanently, but for a large portion of Irish startups, this is not the case).

I really like the idea of a few hundred grants per year of $50,000 each.

Well since they haven’t listened in the last decade, I would imagine there’s even less chance of them doing anything amidst a recession.

Hopefully the new government will be more geared towards what will actually make money (i.e. technology) and save the country they’re attempting to run.
